hero.description: Cloud infrastructure specialist and full stack developer with experience in AWS, Azure, Kubernetes and modern web applications. I combine cloud expertise with end-to-end development to create complete solutions.

about.title: About Me
about.intro: I'm a Cloud Engineer and Full Stack Developer specialized in designing and implementing scalable cloud infrastructures and robust web applications, located in Tegucigalpa, Honduras.
about.description: With over 7 years of experience combining cloud technologies and full stack development, I specialize in legacy application migration, cloud-native architecture implementation, modern web application development, and cost optimization. My focus is on creating complete solutions that drive digital transformation from frontend to infrastructure.

jobs.title: Senior Cloud Engineer & Full Stack Developer
jobs.description: Leadership in cloud migration projects and full stack application development for medium and large enterprises, combining infrastructure and development expertise.
achievements: Successfully migrated 25+ legacy applications to AWS with 99.9% uptime
Developed 15+ full stack web applications with Java/Python/Angular/Node.js
Reduced cloud costs by 40% through optimization and rightsizing
Implemented CI/CD pipelines that reduced deployment time by 80%
Designed multi-region architectures with automated disaster recovery

jobs.title: Senior Cloud Developer
jobs.description: Leadership in banking infrastructure modernization through cloud computing, development of critical modules and implementation of CI/CD pipelines for mission-critical financial applications.
achievements: Developed and implemented cloud-ready modules for ATM systems processing 10,000+ daily transactions
Designed and integrated software products that optimized internal processes reducing operational times by 45%
Implemented automated ETLs and real-time log analysis for critical applications using cloud technologies
Facilitated secure integrations with external providers improving banking connectivity and regulatory compliance
Established CI/CD pipelines from scratch, reducing banking module deployment time from days to hours
Development of 45+ full stack web applications with Java/Angular

jobs.title: Backend Developer
jobs.description: Leadership in critical banking core migration from IBS to SAP, implementing cloud-native architectures with microservices in Kubernetes and modernization of legacy applications.
achievements: Executed complete banking core migration from IBS to SAP with zero service interruptions
Developed containerized microservices architecture with Docker and orchestrated with Kubernetes on OpenShift
Implemented critical Jteller application migration from RPG legacy to modern Java with Node.js backend
Optimized enterprise banking operations through proactive monitoring and automated incident resolution
Established containerization and orchestration standards that reduced deployment time by 70%

certifications.title: Certifications
certifications.subtitle: Active professional certifications in cloud technologies and development

items.role: Lead Cloud Architect & Full Stack Developer
achievements: Zero downtime during migration
35% reduction in operational costs
Cross-cloud DR implementation
Administrative portal with real-time dashboard

items.title: Gibson - Cloud Vehicle Appraisal Platform
items.description: Complete development from scratch of web application for vehicle appraisal with microservices architecture, reactive forms and optimized AWS infrastructure with CloudFront for maximum performance.
items.role: Lead Full Stack Developer & Cloud Architect
achievements: Development of robust and secure JWT authentication module
Implementation of dynamic reporting system with PDF/Excel export
Creation of advanced vehicle configurator with real-time validation
Complete user management with granular roles and permissions
Load optimization with CloudFront reducing latency by 60%

items.title: Avalúos Trochez - Automation & Digitalization
items.description: Development of comprehensive platform to automate and digitalize real estate appraisal processes, implementing intelligent dashboards for cost reduction and operational optimization.
items.role: Lead Cloud Developer & Process Automation Specialist
achievements: Complete digitalization of appraisal processes reducing processing time by 70%
Implementation of predictive dashboards that optimized operational costs by 50%
Automation of report generation with intelligent validation and multi-format export
Integration of APIs to connect multiple real estate data sources
Establishment of scalable cloud infrastructure for operations in Costa Rica
